name: Whirling Death
desc: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.

name: Aphotic Shield
desc: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast. DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: Snowball
desc: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.

name: Blur
desc: Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks, and allowing her to blur her body to disappear from the enemy team's minimap when far from enemy heroes. Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

name: Howl
desc: Grants bonus damage and bonus health to Lycan, all allied heroes and all units under their control. Howl has double effect during night.

name: Enrage
desc: Ursa goes into a frenzy, multiplying his Fury Swipes damage and causing him to take 80% less damage. Removes any existing debuffs. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter. DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: Fervor
desc: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

name: Dragon Blood
desc: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

name: Wall of Replica
desc: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
